articles.title: Tata Steel To Stop Doing Business With Russia | Mint - Mint
articles.description: All of the company's steel manufacturing sites in India, the UK and the Netherlands have sourced alternative supplies of raw materials to end its dependence on Russia, Tata Steel said.
